instructions: Specify the needed directories (with forward slashes), delete the unused key/values and rename this file to _custom_dirs.json for the coop library to read them
app_documents: Per user documents folder to contain things like presets, preferences, etc. Needs read-write permission for active user. Used by: clib.get_app_documents_dir()
program_data: Per workstation data folder to contain caches, etc. Needs read-write permission by all users. Used by: clib.get_program_data_dir()
